name: heft-parameter-plugin-test
description: This project exercises a built-in Heft action with a custom parameter

scripts.build: heft test --clean --custom-parameter --custom-string-parameter test --custom-number-parameter 5 --custom-string-list-parameter eevee -x togepi -x mareep --custom-choice-parameter red --custom-choice-list-parameter totodile -y gudetama -y wobbuffet
